Class Kara

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Kara

public class Kara
extends greenfoot.Actor

This is the superclass for all Karas containing the basic Kara methods. Programs should only be written in subclasses (e.g. MyKara).

Diese Klasse ist die Oberklasse fuer alle Karas und enthaelt die Grundfunktionen von Kara. Programme sollten nur in den Unterklassen wie MyKara geschrieben werden.

Version:
1.3 (2012-07-04)
Author:
Marco Jakob (majakob@gmx.ch)

canPushMushroom

public boolean canPushMushroom()
Kara checks if he can push a mushroom
Kara schaut nach, ob er einen Pilz stossen kann.

Returns:
true if Kara can push a mushroom, false otherwise

getKey

public java.lang.String getKey()
Gets the most recently pressed key
Ermittelt die zuletzt gedrueckte Taste.

Possible Keys are "up", "down", "left", "right", "a", "b", "1", ".", etc.

Returns:
the most recently pressed key as String or an empty String if none was pressed.
